Detailed Description

Base-class template for node scores operating on datasets.

This provides storage for the data descriptor.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

plNodeScore_t::plNodeScore_t ( plDataDescriptor &  data_desc)
inlineexplicit

Construct a node score object operating on a given dataset.

Parameters
data_descthe data descriptor ;

Note that the object keeps a reference to the dataset, so don't destroy it during the lifetime of the score object.
